Model¶

Title¶

lib.Model.Run(Input_Dictionary)[source]¶

Run a simulation of the one component model using the paramaters defined in Input_Dictionary

A typical Input_Dictionary: pulsar = {‘epsI’:‘1.0e-9’, ‘epsA’:”5.0e-11”, ‘omega0’:”1.0e4”, ‘eta’:”1.0e-4”, ‘error’:”1e-14”}

Parameters:
  • epsI (float) – Value of the deformation to the moment of inertia along the 3 - axis e.g \(I_{zz} = I_{0}(1+\epsilon_{I})\)
  • epsA (float) – Magnetic deformation defined by
  • omega0 (float) – Initial rotational speed in \(Hz/rad\)
  • t1 (float) – End time of simulation, if eta is defined then the simulation will halt once either eta is satisfied or at t1
  • n (int) – Number of points to save, superseeds eta parameter
  • eta (float) – A small value for which the simulation will stop EDIT
Returns:

file name of a .hdf5 file containing the saved data
